# Libraries
```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
dat<-fread("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HannahHChu/Proteome_stability_project/master/Data/2018-06-21_thermal_assays_masterdatasheet.csv")

glimpse(dat)
```


# Changing MIN:SEC to minutes
```{r}
rtime<- dat$kd_time
time<-lubridate::minute(ms(rtime))+lubridate::second(ms(rtime))/60
#time

dat$new.labels <- paste(dat$line, dat$pos, sep="")


```

# Creating the Data Frame
```{r}
y <- c(c37,c38, c38.5, c39)
df<-data.frame(c37, c38, c38.5, c39)
df <- as.numeric(as.character(c37, c38, c38.5, c39))
df.long <- gather(df, temp, y)
df.long$temp<- as.numeric(temp)
df.long
```

# Figures
```{r}
line<- ggplot(df.long,aes(x=temp,y=y, colour=temp))+geom_point()+
  labs(x = "KD Temperature (ºC)", y = "KD time (min)") + theme(
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),legend.position="bottom",
        axis.ticks.y=element_blank(),panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),panel.grid.minor =
          element_blank(),axis.text=element_text(size=7),text=element_text(size=15))+geom_smooth(model="lm")  + coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0,200))
line

ex<-ggplot(df.long,aes(x=temp,y=y, colour=temp))+geom_point()+
  labs(x = "KD Temperature (ºC)", y = "KD time (min)") + theme(
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),legend.position="bottom",
        axis.ticks.y=element_blank(),panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major = element_blank(),panel.grid.minor =
          element_blank(),axis.text=element_text(size=7),text=element_text(size=15))+geom_smooth(aes(group = "Subject"), method = "loess", se = T)
ex

```
